sales.description: Random Perks: This item cannot be reacquired from Collections.

displayProperties.description:
Stable barrel attachment.
  •  Increases stability
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
displayProperties.name: Chambered Compensator

displayProperties.description:
Rounds ricochet off hard surfaces. 
  •  Increases stability 
  •  Slightly increases range
displayProperties.name: Ricochet Rounds

displayProperties.description: Final blows grant increased mobility, weapon range, and handling for a short duration.
displayProperties.name: Killing Wind

displayProperties.description: Reloading after a final blow also reloads stowed weapons.
displayProperties.name: Sympathetic Arsenal

  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed

Rounds cause extra damage to combatants' shields and overpenetrate targets.

xur.name: Xûr
xur.description: A peddler of strange curios, Xûr's motives are not his own. He bows to his distant masters, the Nine.
xur.subtitle: Agent of the Nine

sales.name: Exotic Engram
sales.subtitle: Exotic Engram
sales.description:
An engram with a predestined outcome.

Contains a new Exotic if any of the possible rewards remain to be collected. Preview contents for possible rewards.

Complete strikes or win matches in Crucible or Gambit.

Extra progress is awarded for more challenging activities and for succeeding with clanmates.
